snippet: Police say 11 University of Georgia fraternity members face hazing charges after students were beaten with fists as part of an initiation ritual.
abstract: Police say 11 University of Georgia fraternity members face hazing charges after students were beaten with fists as part of an initiation ritual.
lead_paragraph: Police say 11 University of Georgia fraternity members face hazing charges after students were beaten with fists as part of an initiation ritual.

headline.main: Georgia: 11 From Fraternity Face Hazing Charges
headline.print_headline: Georgia: 11 From Fraternity Face Hazing Charges
